sources.title: 1948 - Jungle Goddess - TEMPTRESS ... of 1000 Untamed Men! RULER ... of a Savage Empire!
sources.description:
Strap in for a wild ride! When a plane crash leaves heiress Joan Whitney (Wanda McKay) stranded in the African jungle, she becomes the revered "goddess" of a local tribe guarding a secret diamond mine. Enter pilots Bob Simpson (future SUPERMAN George Reeves!) and Tom Grant (Ralph Byrd), who must rescue her from volcanic eruptions, rival treasure hunters, and jungle dangers. 

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/55pD3Lxy-OA


üìΩÔ∏è CREDITS:
Director: Lewis D. Collins
Writers: Jo Pagano, William Stephens
Starring: George Reeves, Wanda McKay, Ralph Byrd, Armida 
Produced by: Sam Katzman Productions 
Distributed by: Columbia Pictures 
Genres: Action, Adventure, Crime, Romance


üî• Vintage adventure at its pulpy best: 
- Vine-swinging action & tribal intrigue 
- George Reeves' pre-Superman heroics 
- A time capsule of 1940s B-movie magic 

üíé Fun Fact: Olympic skater Rita Shawn (billed as Wanda McKay) traded ice for jungle vines in this role!

metadata.Plot: When a plane carrying the daughter of a millionaire crashes in an African jungle, two pilots set out to collect the reward. They discover that she has become the goddess of a primitive tribe. An insurgent witch doctor and fierce wild animals make escape from the jungle difficult for the trio.
metadata.Actors: George Reeves, Wanda McKay, Ralph Byrd
